fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this rolls you must roll any one Fox Head if none are present.
- You have a random non-Fox role that will take the place of this role card, without knowing you are really the Oni.
- The Foxes will know your name and role, but won't be in a chat with you.
- 3 times per game, the Foxes can control you.
